docstring.long_description: This block should also work with compatible Tektronix AFG31XXX instruments.
docstring.short_description: Take the input waveform and use it as the arbitrary wavefunction.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_AFG31000 block).

parameters.name: memory_state
parameters.description: Save the function in "Edit Memory" 1 or 2.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Choose the channel to use with the waveform.

parameters.name: frequency
parameters.description: The voltage of the waveform to set, in Hz.

parameters.name: amplitude
parameters.description: The voltage of the waveform to set.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The voltage offset to set the waveform to, in volts.

parameters.name: phase
parameters.description: The phase to set the waveform to, in degrees.

videos.title: Control the AFG31000 Function Generator with Flojoy
